item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Running Components Running a component throws an ‘Unable to find image’ error. How do I fix this? Depending on how an executable was created, a Docker container might not have been created. To solve this issue, run the executable with a ---setup flag attached. This will automatically build the Docker container for you. $ target/docker/foo/foo ---setup > docker build -t foo:0.0.1 /home/rcannood/workspace/viash_temp/viashsetupdocker-foo-KeBjFs Or when working with viash run: $ viash run src/mnn/config.
